mcq.statement: Which of the of proper use of preposition? "If I am lying, the course of Allah be on me and may I be drowned in some period. May I even be deprived of a decent burial!", "If I am laying, the course of Allah be on me and may I be drowned in some period. May I even be deprived from a decent burial!", "If I am lying, the course of Allah be on me and may I be drowned in some period. May I even be deprived at a decent burial!", None of these

options.a: "If I am lying, the course of Allah be on me and may I be drowned in some period. May I even be deprived of a decent burial!"
options.b: "If I am laying, the course of Allah be on me and may I be drowned in some period. May I even be deprived from a decent burial!"
options.c: "If I am lying, the course of Allah be on me and may I be drowned in some period. May I even be deprived at a decent burial!"
